languages.text: Инквизитор завоевал славу человека, снисходительного к мелким порокам и склонного к сомнительным методам. Спустя десятилетия ван Калокс был заклеймлен собственными учениками как опасный радикал, не гнушающийся инструментов Хаоса для достижения своих целей. Прежде, чем они успели предать своего наставника трибуналу, Инквизитор бесследно пропал среди отдаленных звезд Простора.

The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Инквизитор завоевал славу человека, снисходительного к мелким порокам и склонного к сомнительным методам. Спустя десятилетия ван Калокс был заклеймлен собственными учениками как опасный радикал, не гнушающийся инструментов Хаоса для достижения своих целей. Прежде, чем они успели предать своего наставника трибуналу, Инквизитор бесследно пропал среди отдаленных звезд Простора.

traits.locale_text: The Inquisitor gained a reputation as a man lenient towards small vices and prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox was branded a dangerous radical by his own students, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his goals. Before they could hand their mentor over to the court, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

Before they could hand their mentor over to the court, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

The Inquisitor gained a reputation for being lenient toward small vices and prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his goals. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his goals. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官常常包容那些微不足道的罪行，并倾向于使用可疑的方法，这使得他声名远播。数十年后，他的学生将他视为危险的激进分子，认为他准备利用混沌大敌的造物来实现自己的目的。然而，这些人还没来得及把他们的导师交给法庭，冯·卡洛克斯审判官就消失在了科罗努斯扩区的遥远群星之间，没有留下一丝踪迹。
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官常常包容那些微不足道的罪行，并倾向于使用可疑的方法，这使得他声名在外。数十年后，他的学生将他视为危险的激进分子，认为他准备利用混沌大敌的造物来实现自己的目的。然而，这些人还没来得及把他们得导师交给法庭，冯·卡洛克斯审判官就消失在了科罗努斯扩区的遥远群星之间，没有留下一丝踪迹。

languages.text: Der Inquisitor erwarb sich den Ruf, Milde gegenüber kleinen Lastern zu zeigen und oft fragwürdige Methoden einzusetzen. Jahrzehnte später wurde van Calox von seinen eigenen Schülern als gefährlicher Radikaler eingestuft, als jemand, der bereit war, zur Erreichung seiner Ziele die Instrumente des Chaos einzusetzen. Bevor sie ihren Mentor dem Tribunal aushändigen konnten, verschwand der Inquisitor spurlos in den fernen Sternen am Rande der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Der Inquisitor hatte den Ruf, Milde gegenüber kleinen Lastern zu zeigen und fragwürdige Methoden einzusetzen. Jahrzehnte später wurde van Calox von seinen eigenen Schülern als gefährlicher Radikaler eingestuft, als jemand, der bereit war, zur Erreichung seiner Ziele die Instrumente des Chaos einzusetzen. Bevor sie ihren Mentor dem Tribunal aushändigen konnten, verschwand der Inquisitor spurlos in den fernen Sternen am Rande der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: L'inquisiteur devint connu pour son indulgence envers les petits vices et pour ses méthodes douteuses. Bien des années plus tard, les propres élèves de van Calox le qualifièrent de dangereux radical prêt à user des instruments du Chaos pour parvenir à ses fins. Avant qu'ils ne puissent livrer leur mentor au tribunal, il se volatilisa parmi les étoiles lointaines aux confins des Étendues.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: L'inquisiteur devint connu pour l'indulgence dont il faisait preuve envers les petits vices et pour les méthodes douteuses qu'il employait. Bien des années plus tard, les propres élèves de van Calox le qualifièrent de dangereux radical prêt à user des instruments du Chaos pour atteindre ses objectifs. Avant qu'ils ne puissent livrer leur mentor au tribunal, il se volatilisa parmi les étoiles lointaines aux confins des Étendues.

languages.text: El Inquisidor se ganó la reputación de ser permisivo hacia los vicios menores y de favorecer métodos cuestionables. Décadas después, los propios estudiantes de van Calox lo acusaron de ser un radical peligroso y de estar dispuesto a utilizar los instrumentos del Caos para cumplir sus objetivos. Antes de que pudieran entregar a su mentor al tribunal, el Inquisidor desapareció sin dejar rastro entre las estrellas distantes de las fronteras de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: El Inquisidor se ganó una reputación de ser permisivo hacia los vicios menores y de favorecer métodos cuestionables. Décadas después, los propios estudiantes de van Calox lo acusaron de ser un radical peligroso y de estar dispuesto a utilizar los instrumentos del Caos para cumplir sus objetivos. Antes de que pudieran entregar a su mentor al tribunal, el Inquisidor desapareció sin dejar rastro entre las estrellas distantes de las fronteras de la Extensión.

languages.text: 異端審問官は、小さな悪事には寛大で、疑わしい方法を用いる傾向がある人物として知られるようになった。数十年後、ヴァン・キャロックス自身の教え子たちは、彼を危険な過激派、自分の目的を達成するために渾沌の道具を使う決意のある人物だと烙印を押した。彼らが師を法廷に引き渡す前に、異端審問官はエクスパンスの端の遠い星々の間に跡形もなく姿を消した。
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 異端審問官は、小さな悪徳に甘く、疑わしい方法を使いがちだという評判を受けた。数十年後、ヴァン・キャロックス自身の教え子たちは、彼を危険な過激派、自分の目的を達成するために渾沌の道具を使う決意のある人物だと烙印を押した。彼らが師を法廷に引き渡す前に、異端審問官はエクスパンスの端の遠い星々の間に跡形もなく姿を消した。

languages.text: Engizisyoncu, küçük kusurlara esneklik göstermesiyle ve şüphe uyandırıcı metotlar kullanmasıyla tanınır oldu. On yıllar sonra van Calox, bizzat kendi öğrencileri tarafından tehlikeli bir radikal olmak ve amaçlarına ulaşmak için Kaos gereçlerini kullanmaya hazır olmakla itham edildi. Öğrencileri eski yönderlerini mahkemeye teslim edemeden önce iz bırakmadan, Enginlik'in en kenarlarındaki ücra yıldızlar arasında kaybolup gitti.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor became known as one who showed lenience toward small vices and who was prone to using questionable methods. Decades later, van Calox's own students branded him a dangerous radical, someone ready to use the instruments of Chaos to achieve his ends. Before they could hand their mentor over to the tribunal, the Inquisitor disappeared without a trace among the distant stars at the edge of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Engizisyoncu, küçük kusurlara karşı esneklik göstermesiyle ve şüphe uyandırıcı bazı metotlar kullanmasıyla tanınır oldu. On yıllar sonra van Calox, direkt olarak kendi öğrencileri tarafından tehlikeli bir radikal olmakla ve amaçlarına ulaşmak için Kaos gereçlerini kullanmaya hazır olmakla itham edildi. Yönderleri, öğrencileri onu mahkemeye teslim edemeden önce Enginlik'in en kenarlarındaki üzra yıldızlar arasında iz bırakmadan yok oldu.
